app.name: spyglass
app.summary: This is an Atrenta app to generate the configuration file of the design to run it in SpyGlass. The configuration file is named as follows: <design-top>.prj. To run SpyGlass, ensure that the required software and the licenses are available. Invoke SpyGlass using the command: spyglass -project <design-top>.prj. Follow the steps outlined in the SpyGlass user guide.
app.display: Atrenta SpyGlass for Lint and CDC

proc.summary: This proc generates the spyglass project file
